title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
Hi,

I have an A1278 820-3115-B that is not charging.

I have 12.55V on PPBUS_G3H w/o battery, and 8.96V with battery connected.

Diode readings:
SCL= 0.543
SDA= 0.536 

R5281= 1,979 ohms
R5280= 1,996 ohms 

Already removed D6950 but same result.

Can you help?

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
"8.96V with battery connected."
Battery alone (no charger)?

Did you try disconnecting BIL?
Is the battery recognized by macOS?
Tried known good battery?

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
Hi,

8.96V with battery, and charger connected. W/O charger 11.19V

Now I'm testing it with just the board on the bench, and w/o BIL

The battery isen't recognized on the macOS, and alreay tried a known good battery.

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message: Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
Be sure R7000 is good.

Try changing U7000.
If still the same, change SMC...

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
R7000  it's OK.

I've replaced U7000, but  PPBUS_G3H is increasing voltage with battery connected. Started at 8.9V and now is at 11V. Shouldn't it be decreasing?

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
With charger and battery connected, PPBUS_G3H slowly increases when battery is charging.
Once battery is fully charged, PPBUS_G3H should go to 12.5V and Magsafe light switches from amber to green.

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
HI,

I'm going to replace the SMC.

Strangly, it seams that the battery is charging, but the mac don't work with battery alone.  If I unplug the charger power cable, it loses image, the the fan keeps spining (witch indicates that it has battery). It seams that it hibernates when the charger is unpluged, because if i plug the power again, un push the power button, it is still in the desktop.

PPBUS_G3H  increased at 12.5V, but the battery isen't recognized in the OS...

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message: Just in case, check SMC_LID level.

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message: I've replaced the SMC and now it charges the battery, but only withou the LID connected. Is there any way to solve this?

title: A1278 820-3115-B not charging
message:
SMC_LID is 3V with BIL connected?
Check SCL/SDA lines w/ and w/o BIL connected; voltage and diode mode to ground.
